medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed acute pain after eating an egg and cheese breakfast sandwich. The pain was crampy and constant with intermittent periods of worsening associated with nausea and emesis. Pain recurred the evening after trialing a small amount of food. She woke up still in pain before presenting to the hospital.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Endometriosis s/p laparoscopy as a teenager, kidney stones, gallstones diagnosed during pregnancy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with COPD and vascular disease from smoking; father passed away from stomach cancer.
